page.title: 19MOTTRAM/ALDERLEY EDGE
page.content: In Alderley there are two{independent schools which take girls between the ages of 5_18 a{county primary school and an{independent play school. {Mt.Carmel}was founded in{1945}it is attached to{St.Joseph's R.C.Convent. It caters for about{600 girls}of all denominations taking them from all over Cheshire.The school offers a wide curriculum and enjoys a fine record of acedemic achievement. { { St.Hilarys }was opened in {1880 }and is part of the{Woodward Foundation. There are{316 girls}which comprises a junior and a senior department.The average number in each{class is 20. The school aims to maintain high acedemic standards and has a special interest in the sciences.Other subjects include computer studies, control technology,and life skills.
